title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: Typescript Backend Developer creating high-quality platforms

itemsDescriptions.description: Developed scalable serverless architectures on AWS Lambda, optimizing for efficiency and performance.
Designed and maintained secure microservices in TypeScript and Node.js for reliable payment processing.
Led cross-functional collaboration with product, design, and analytics teams to improve user activation flows.
Automated deployments using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to streamline release processes and enhance reliability.
Ensured security and compliance with industry standards like PCI DSS for safeguarding payment data.

title: SSr Backend Developer
shortDescription: Typescript Backend Developer creating high-quality platforms

itemsDescriptions.description: Led the development of a serverless AWS-based configurator process using TypeScript and KV database.
Contributed to global product recommendations, reducing costs and enhancing scalability

title: SSr Backend Developer
shortDescription: Member of the backend team of a fintech and crypto project

itemsDescriptions.description: Worked on a new project to create a fiat and crypto wallet, using JavaScript and TypeScript.
Achieved goals of reducing infrastructure costs and learning about new crypto technologies in a startup environment.
Maintained CRM channels, including phone and messaging services, built with Java.
Replaced a legacy monolith chat application with a microservices structure, primarily using Go.
Supporting a designated group of students undertaking teacher designated activities
Promote their own continuous professional development, and engage enthusiastically with the processes of become a developer.
working in main players of industries like Siemens and Airbus
Leading multidisciplinary team on differents sites
